alert.note: Alert for Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 8:22AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Hutchinson, Bon Homme and Yankton Counties. James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River above Yankton affecting Yankton County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River above Yankton. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, significant agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue rising to a crest of 12.6 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat James River Yankton 12.0 11.1 Wed 9 am 11.5 12.0 12.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Thursday morning.
